attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Knife crime has become a big issue! Young people are carrying knifes around and many people have came to the conclusion that if you have a knife on you, you intend to use it… our Hospitals report a rise in ‘stab wounds’ particularly among young males! Here are some of the reasons given for their use:
•	Fear or self-protection/defense. 
•	To steal, by threats to harm (often to fund a drug habit). 
•	Harass, intimidate or even for ‘kicks’ 
•	Peer pressure. 
•	To command ‘Respect’ and status 
We need to stop this as it is taking away to many young lives. 
Carrying a knife around is illegal and it needs to stop…
It causes many people to worry when out on the streets and families are stressing about their young children when they go out. Gangs are forming and fights are getting more popular…

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
